RainbruRPG::Options::OptionPanel

RainbruRPG::Options::OptionPanel Class Reference

#include <optionpanel.h>

Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Options::OptionPanel:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

A panel for the launcher option dialog.

It is used by the OptiionManager

Definition at line 87 of file optionpanel.cpp.

RainbruRPG::Options::OptionButton * RainbruRPG::Options::OptionPanel::getButtonByName ( const char *  n  ) 

Returns a pointer to an existing OptionButton.

Iterates through the OptionButton list, if the name passed in parameter is used, return a pointer to this, otherwise, returns NULL.

This function uses std::strcmp.

Parameters:
n The caption of the button to search
Returns:
A pointer to the existing button or NULL if not found.
See also:
OptionButton
